mapper.insert: insert into accommodations values ( default, #{itineraryId}, #{dayNumber}, #{name}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, now() )
mapper.select: select accommodation_id, itinerary_id, day_number, name, address, latitude, longitude, created_at from accommodations where itinerary_id = #{itineraryId} order by day_num asc
select accommodation_id, itinerary_id, day_number, name, address, latitude, longitude, created_at from accommodations where itinerary_id = #{itineraryId} and day_number = #{dayNumber}
mapper.update: update accommodations set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude} where accommodation_id = #{accommodationId}
